name: enzyme

scripts.prepublish: not-in-publish || (npm run clean && npm run build && safe-publish-latest)
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean && npm run docs:publish
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test:only
scripts.test:all: npm run react:13 && npm run test:only && npm run react:14 && npm run test:only && npm run react:15.4 && npm run test:only && npm run react:15 && npm run test:only
scripts.react:clean: npm run clean-local-npm && rimraf node_modules/react node_modules/react-dom node_modules/react-addons-test-utils node_modules/react-test-renderer && npm prune
scripts.react:13: npm run react:clean && npm install && npm i --no-save react@0.13
scripts.react:14: npm run react:clean && npm install && npm i --no-save react@0.14 react-dom@0.14 react-addons-test-utils@0.14
scripts.react:15.4: npm run react:clean && npm install && npm i --no-save react@15.4 react-dom@15.4 react-addons-test-utils@15.4
scripts.react:15: npm run react:clean && npm install && npm i --no-save react@15 react-dom@15 create-react-class@15 react-test-renderer@^15.5.4
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git fetch git@github.com:airbnb/enzyme.git gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:airbnb/enzyme.git gh-pages --force
